gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: ISLSCP II IGBP DISCOVER LAND COVER
ISLSCP II IGBP DISCOVER LAND COVER

gmd19157:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Calculation of omission and commission statistics from sample polygons.

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Tropical forest cover change in the 1990s and options for future monitoring

gmd19157:valueType.gco:RecordType: Confusion matrix recording counts from ground truthing

gmd19157:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: Analysis published in a peer-reviewed journal article with full description of methodology.

gmd19157:statement.gco:CharacterString: The thematic validation procedure was carried out using design-based inference which conforms to the CEOS Cal-Val recommendations. The resulting research was published in a peer-reviewed journal, and the component datasets generated for the validation are available online.
The thematic validation procedure was carried out using design-based inference which conforms to the CEOS Cal-Val recommendations.

gmd19157:description.gco:CharacterString: Stratified sampling of ground truth blocks.

gmd19157:rationale.gco:CharacterString: Systematic sampling to obtain an irregular stratification with different sampling rates for each stratum.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Joint Research Centre of the European Commission

gmd19157:description.gco:CharacterString: Schematic sub-sampling of all landcover categories

Interpretation by regional experts of 3x3km sample boxes at specified sample sites. Regional interpreters used ancillary data like aerial photographs, thematic maps and NDVI profiles at coarse resolution in support to the Landsat interpretation.

gmd19157:rationale.gco:CharacterString: Local knowledge required to verify exact landcovers at each ground truth point.

gmd19157:description.gco:CharacterString: Collected table of landcover categories for all sample sites.
Cross-validation of independently interpreted sites against GLC data to generate confusion matrix and Kappa statistic.

gmd19157:rationale.gco:CharacterString: Identification of classes prone to confusion, and overall assessment of the accuracy of the classification.

gmd19157:description.gco:CharacterString: Confusion matrix and overall accuracy value.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The metadata records is beyond the expectation allowing for error traceability. Very detailed quality information.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The data can be recommended for land cover research. The metadata records is beyond the expectation allowing for error traceability.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset was used for classification of land cover in the UK between 2010 and 2012. Extremely detailed metadata record.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The metadata records was beyond my expectation.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: I used this dataset for observation of the UK land use between 2000 and 2010. The data is of very high quality. Metadata record provides quality information.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The dataset and metadata record are of very good quality.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: This dataset was used to assess vegetation cover in the south region of Italy in 2012. The data can be recommended for land cover applications.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The data is suitable for land cover applications.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset was used to monitor changes in forest cover in Germany between 2005 and 2010. We would recommend this dataset for forestry and land use applications.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The dataset is recommended for land cover research.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: I used this dataset for monitoring changes in land cover in the UK between 2000 and 2010. The data is of high quality and quality information is available.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The data is of high quality and quality information is available.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset was used for classification of land cover. The dataset and metadata record are of high quality. Quality information is available.
We used this dataset to classify vegetation cover in Turkey for the year 2011. The dataset provides very good spatial and temporal coverage.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The dataset provides very good spatial and temporal coverage. Quality information is available.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: We would recommend this dataset for landcover research.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: Metadata record is extremely good. Quality and lineage information is available.

gvq:usage.gvq:usageDescription: Our university used this dataset to monitor changes in land use in Spain between 2005 and 2010.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset was used to monitor land use in the UK between June 2010 and July 2013. Metadta record provided us with lineage information which allowed traceability.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: The data is of high quality. Metadata record provides lineage information.

gvq:userComment.gvq:comment: The dataset was used for classification of forests cover in Spain between 2010 and 2013. We discovered that data for June - August 2011 was missing but apart from this the dataset is of good quality.

gvq:rating.gvq:justification: Overall, very good temporal and spatial coverage. Data is missing for Spain region between June and August 2011.
